litigation.wiki_content:
* '''UYAP citizen portals''' – [https://vatandas.uyap.gov.tr UYAP portal – case search].  The National Judiciary Informatics System provides several portals for accessing court records and decisions.  Citizens can log in with an e-Government ID to check the status of civil, criminal and administrative cases, view hearing dates and obtain copies of decisions.  Full access requires authentication.

* '''Turkish Supreme Court (Yargıtay) case search''' – [http://emsal.yargitay.gov.tr/VeriBankasiIstemciWeb/ Supreme Court case search].  The Yargıtay’s online database allows users to search Supreme Court decisions by keywords, parties, file number or court.  It provides access to anonymised rulings and legal precedents; searches are in Turkish.

* '''Third-party case law portals''' – [https://www.ictihatlar.com.tr/ Case law portal].  Private websites such as ictihatlar.com aggregate selected, anonymised court decisions from various levels of the judiciary.  They offer searchable databases of case summaries and judgments (Turkish only).

New York Secretary of State allows a company name or number search and yields basic company information. The Corporation and Business Entity Database includes business and not for profit corporations, limited partnerships, limited liability companies, limited liability partnerships, and other miscellaneous businesses. The database also includes assumed name filings for corporations, limited liability companies and limited partnerships.

[https://apps.nyc.gov/dbnyc/ NYC Doing Business entity search

The Doing Business Search provides access to information on entities and individuals that dobusiness with the City of New York. Details returned include owner and director names.

[https://www.corporationwiki.com CorporationWiki]

Corporation Wiki provides corporate transparency and historical data on companies.

[http://publicrecords360.com.testednet.com Public Records 360]

PublicRecords360 is designed to help you safely find people and learn about others. PublicRecords360 is not a consumer reporting agency as defined by the Fair Credit Reporting Act (FCRA).

[https://archive.investigativereportingworkshop.org Investigative Reporting Workshop (TARP Recipients)]

This is a listing of firms (mostly bank holding companies) that have received money through the Treasury Department's Troubled Asset Relief Program. The search will return a list of firms that match your request. Again, enter as much as you know. When you select the entity you are interested in, you will get details of the TARP transaction and a list of the banks controlled by the firm. Selecting a bank will take you to details on that specific bank. The list is provided by the Investigative Reporting Workshop.						

The rest of the available corporate registry pages regarding New York is locked behind Arachnys registration and log-in.

litigation.wiki_content:
=== New York Litigation Links (Criminal, Civil, Tax) === ==== New York Courts Overview ==== New York has 62 counties. The New York court system consists of the following courts: * Supreme Courts * County Courts * Family Courts * Surrogate’s Courts * Civil Courts of the City of New York * Criminal Courts of the City of New York * District Courts / City Courts * Town Courts and Village Courts * Courts of Claim ---- ==== Key Resources and Guidance ==== ; New York State Unified Court System (Civil Local) (pub) : URL: https://iapps.courts.state.ny.us/webcivilLocal/LCMain
Search Tips / Guidance
• Use “Party Search” to search by name.
• For common names, limit the search to your subject's county(ies).
• Set case status to “All” to see all cases.
• For civil cases from Bloomberg Law, paste the case number into “Index search” instead of “Party search” to view documents.
; New York State Unified Court System (Criminal) (pub) : URL: https://iapps.courts.state.ny.us/webcrim_attorney/AttorneyWelcome
Search Tips / Guidance
• Search by defendant name.
; New York State Unified Court System (Criminal and Civil) (pub) : URL: https://iapps.courts.state.ny.us/nyscef/CaseSearch?TAB=name
Search Tips / Guidance
• Search as guest using party name or index number.
• Use dropdown menus to narrow results by county or case type.
• Additional documents may be found here beyond other portals.
; New York State Court of Claims (pub) : URL: https://ww2.nycourts.gov/COURTS/nyscourtofclaims/index.shtml
Search Tips / Guidance
• Search by judge’s or claimant’s last name.
; New York State Unified Court System (Supreme Courts) (pub) : URL: https://iapps.courts.state.ny.us/webcivil/FCASMain
Search Tips / Guidance
• Covers supreme courts in all 62 counties.
• Use same instructions as the Civil Local search.
• For disputes over $25,000 and other criteria.
; New York State Supreme Court and County Clerk of New York (pub) : URL: https://iapps.courts.state.ny.us/iscroll/index.jsp
Search Tips / Guidance
• Search by plaintiff or defendant using “last name, first name” format.
• Not a Boolean search, so common names are better searched on Bloomberg Law first.
• Use case numbers from Bloomberg Law to find case documents here.
; Bloomberg Law (BLaw) (priv) : URL: https://www.bloomberglaw.com/
Search Tips / Guidance
• Includes criminal, civil, and tax cases.
• Indexes all parties, including non-leads.
• Start your research here before public eCourt searches.
• Check judgments, liens, Supreme Court dockets, and county coverage.
• Refer to BLaw guidance pages for more details.
; Westchester County, New York (priv) : URL: https://wro.westchesterclerk.com/Login/Login.aspx?ReturnUrl=%2f
Search Tips / Guidance
• Requires purchase of a daily subscription.
• Covers only Westchester County.
; New York Litigation Document Search (priv) : URL: https://iapps.courts.state.ny.us/nyscef/CaseSearch
Search Tips / Guidance
• Search for lawsuit documents via NY State Courts Elec

litigation.wiki_content:
If your subject has litigation history or court cases, search using the databases below. ===Alaska Appellate Courts=== '''[http://www.appellate.courts.state.ak.us/lookup.asp Alaska Appellate Courts Case Management System]''' (''pub'') Search Alaska Appellate Courts cases by last name of a party.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Search by party last name :- Covers Alaska appellate court cases only
===Allen County Clerk of Courts=== '''[http://courtvweb.allencountyohio.com/eservices/home.page.2 Allen County Clerk of Courts]''' (''pub'') Search public records from Allen County Clerk of Courts by name of entity or individual.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Search by individual or entity name :- Covers Allen County, Ohio court records
===Athens Municipal Court=== '''[https://eservices.ci.athens.oh.us/eservices/home.page.2 Athens Municipal Court]''' (''pub'') Search Athens Municipal Court records by name of entity or individual.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Search by individual or entity name :- Covers Athens, Ohio municipal court cases
===Broward County Court Florida=== '''[https://www.browardclerk.org/Web2/CaseSearch/ Broward County Court Florida]''' (''pub'') Search Broward County court dockets by party name, business name, case number or citation number.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Multiple search options available :- Covers all Broward County court cases
===Central District Courts of California=== '''[https://www.cacd.uscourts.gov/cases-dept/court-opinions Central District Courts of California Opinions and Orders]''' (''pub'') Search for opinions and orders from the Central District Courts of California by keyword or name.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Covers cases from 2000 to 2014 :- Search by keyword or party name :- Federal district court opinions only
===Central District California Bankruptcy Unclaimed Funds=== '''[https://www.cacb.uscourts.gov/unclaimed-funds Central District of California Bankruptcy Unclaimed Funds]''' (''pub'') Search for unclaimed funds from bankruptcy proceedings by creditor or debtor name.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Search by creditor or debtor name :- Specific to Central District of California bankruptcy cases :- Useful for asset recovery research
===Cook County Civil Court=== '''[http://www.cookcountyclerkofcourt.org/CourtCaseSearch/DocketSearch.aspx Cook County Civil Court]''' (''pub'') Search Cook County Civil Court records by name of entity or individual.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Search as plaintiff or defendant :- Covers Cook County, Illinois civil cases
===Cornell Legal Information Institute=== '''[https://www.law.cornell.edu/ Cornell University - Legal Information Institute]''' (''pub'') Comprehensive legal research database with federal and state court opinions, statutes, and regulations.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Extensive case law database :- Covers federal and state courts :- Also provides access to statutes and regulations
===Delaware Municipal Courts=== '''[https://connect.municipalcourt.org/ Delaware City Municipal Courts]''' (''pub'') Search Delaware Municipal Courts for civil, traffic, and criminal cases.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Search by plaintiff name or general search :- Covers Delaware municipal court cases
===Delaware Court Records=== '''[https://www.delawarecountyclerk.org/court-records/ Delaware Court Records]''' (''pub'') Search Delaware County Clerk's office court records using CourtView 2000 database.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Search by individual or company name :- Covers Delaware County court records
===District of Columbia Courts=== '''[https://www.dccourts.gov/cco/maincase.jsf District of Columbia Courts]''' (''pub'') Search DC court records by first and last name of individual.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Search by individual name only :- Covers Washington DC court cases
===Duval County Clerk of Courts=== '''[https://core.duvalclerk.com/CoreCms.aspx Duval County Clerk of Courts]''' (''pub'') Limited public search of individuals and legal entities through Clerk Online Resource ePortal.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Search individuals and legal entities :- Covers Duval County, Florida court records
===Clark County District Court=== '''[https://www.clarkcountycourts.us/Anonymous/default.aspx Eighth Judicial District Court Records Inquiry]''' (''pub'') Search Clark County family, civil and criminal records by case number, party name, citation or attorney name.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Multiple search options available :- Covers Clark County, Nevada court records
===Fairfax County Courthouse=== '''[https://www.fairfaxcounty.gov/courts/circuit/online-case-information Fairfax County Courthouse of Virginia]''' (''pub'') Access to the Court Public Access Network for Fairfax County court records.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Court Public Access Network :- Covers Fairfax County, Virginia court cases
===Fairfield County Courts=== '''[https://www.co.fairfield.oh.us/Commonpleas/fc-Case-Information-Records-Search.html Fairfield County Common Pleas Court]''' (''pub'') Search Fairfield County Common Pleas Court records by party name.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Search by party name :- Covers Fairfield County, Ohio Common Pleas cases
===Fairfield County Municipal Court=== '''[https://www.fairfieldmunicipalcourt.org/case-search Fairfield County Municipal Court]''' (''pub'') Search civil, criminal and traffic cases by party last name or entity name.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Separate search for civil vs criminal cases :- Covers Fairfield County, Ohio municipal court
===Florida Supreme Court=== '''[http://onlinedocketssc.flcourts.org/ Florida Supreme Court Online Docket]''' (''pub'') Search Florida Supreme Court dockets and entity information.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Entity search available :- Covers Florida Supreme Court cases only
===FTC Enforcement Cases=== '''[https://www.ftc.gov/enforcement/cases-proceedings FTC Enforcement Cases & Proceedings]''' (''pub'') Search US Federal Trade Commission enforcement cases and proceedings.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Search by company name or case type :- Covers federal trade commission enforcement actions
===Fulton County Superior Court=== '''[https://publicrecordsaccess.fultoncountyga.gov/Portal/ Fulton County Superior Court]''' (''pub'') Search Fulton County Superior Court records by citation, date, parties or attorney.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Multiple search criteria available :- Covers Fulton County, Georgia Superior Court cases
===Hamilton Municipal Court=== '''[http://www.hamiltonmunicipalcourt.org/AWC/Court/ Hamilton Municipal Court]''' (''pub'') Search Hamilton Municipal Court cases in Butler County, Ohio.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Municipal court cases only :- Covers Hamilton, Ohio municipal court
===Hawaii State Judiciary=== '''[https://www.courts.state.hi.us/legal_references/records/jims_system_availability Hawaii State Judiciary]''' (''pub'') Search civil cases filed in Circuit, District, and Family Courts by entity or individual name.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Search by entity or individual name :- Covers Hawaii state court system
===Idaho Supreme Court Data Repository=== '''[https://mycourts.idaho.gov/odysseyportal Idaho Supreme Court Data Repository]''' (''pub'') Search by entity name through legal cases of all Idaho counties.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Search by entity name :- Covers all Idaho counties
===Iowa Courts=== '''[https://www.iowacourts.state.ia.us/ESAWebApp/SelectFrame Iowa Courts Case Search]''' (''pub'') Search Iowa court records by firm name or last name.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Search by firm or individual name :- Covers Iowa state court system
===Judici Illinois Courts=== '''[http://www.judici.com/ Judici Database of Illinois Courts]''' (''pub'') Limited access to records of most Illinois courts.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Limited access to records :- Covers most Illinois courts
===Kansas District Court Records=== '''[https://www.kansas.gov/countyCourts/ Kansas District Court Records Search]''' (''pub'') Search civil, criminal and juvenile legal records for Kansas courts.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Covers civil, criminal and juvenile cases :- Kansas state court system
===Licking County Common Pleas=== '''[https://lickingcounty.gov/depts/clerk/ Licking County Common Pleas Court]''' (''pub'') Search Licking County civil court cases by person name.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Search by person name :- Covers Licking County, Ohio civil cases
===Maryland Courts=== '''[http://casesearch.courts.state.md.us/casesearch/ Maryland Courts Records Search]''' (''pub'') Search Maryland state courts for judgments and opinions by company or individual name.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Search by company or individual name :- Covers both circuit and district courts statewide
===Massachusetts Trial Court=== '''[https://www.masscourts.org/eservices/home.page.2 Massachusetts Trial Court Database]''' (''pub'') Search records of BMC, District, Housing, Land, Probate and Family, and Superior Courts.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Covers multiple court types :- Massachusetts state court system
===Miami County Courts Ohio=== '''[http://commonpleas.miamicountyohio.gov/eservicesCP/home.page.2 Miami County Common Pleas Court]''' (''pub'') Search Miami County, Ohio court cases by person last name or company name.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Search by individual or company name :- Covers Miami County, Ohio Common Pleas and Municipal courts
===Miami-Dade County Courts=== '''[https://www2.miami-dadeclerk.com/ocs/Search.aspx Miami-Dade County Clerk of Courts]''' (''pub'') Search Civil, Family and Probate Courts of Miami-Dade County, Florida by party name.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Search by party name :- Covers Miami-Dade County civil, family and probate cases
===Middletown Municipal Court=== '''[https://court.cityofmiddletown.org/eservices/home.page.2 Middletown Municipal Court]''' (''pub'') Search Middletown Municipal Court cases in Ohio.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Municipal court cases only :- Covers Middletown, Ohio
===Nebraska Trial Courts=== '''[https://www.nebraska.gov/justicecc/ccname.cgi Nebraska Trial Courts Online Case Search]''' (''pub'') Online access to most Nebraska State Trial Court case information.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Covers most Nebraska trial courts :- Statewide coverage
===New Jersey Courts=== '''[https://portal.njcourts.gov/webe4/JudgmentInquiry/ New Jersey Courts Judgment Search]''' (''pub'') Search computerized records in custody of the New Jersey Judiciary.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Judgment search specific :- New Jersey state courts
===New Mexico Courts=== '''[https://caselookup.nmcourts.gov/caselookup/ New Mexico Courts Case Lookup]''' (''pub'') Search New Mexico state court cases including Bernalillo County Metropolitan Court.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Statewide court case lookup :- Includes metropolitan and state courts
===New York State Courts=== '''[https://iapps.courts.state.ny.us/webcivilLocal/LCMain New York Local Civil Courts]''' (''pub'') Search cases from all local Civil Courts in New York State.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Local civil courts only :- Statewide New York coverage
===New York Criminal Courts=== '''[https://iapps.courts.state.ny.us/webcrim_attorney/DefendantSearch New York State Courts of Criminal Jurisdiction]''' (''pub'') Search by defendant name, case number or summons number for criminal cases.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Criminal jurisdiction only :- Search by defendant name or case details
===New York Supreme Court=== '''[https://iapps.courts.state.ny.us/iscroll/SQLData.jsp New York State Supreme Court]''' (''pub'') Search by defendant or plaintiff name through New York State Supreme Court cases.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Supreme Court cases only :- Search by plaintiff or defendant name
===New York Criminal History=== '''[https://iapps.courts.state.ny.us/chrs/ New York State Unified Court System Criminal History]''' (''pub'') Criminal history record search for New York State Unified Court System.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Criminal history specific :- New York state unified system
===New York Administrative Hearings=== '''[https://dos.ny.gov/office-administrative-hearings Office of Administrative Hearings, New York]''' (''pub'') Search Administrative Hearing Decisions and Administrative Appeals Decisions.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Administrative hearings only :- Full text search available
===Orange County Clerk of Courts=== '''[https://myeclerk.myorangeclerk.com/Cases/Search Orange County Clerk of Courts]''' (''pub'') Search Orange County court cases by entity or individual name.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Search by entity or individual name :- Orange County court cases
===Oregon Tax Court=== '''[https://cdm17027.contentdm.oclc.org/digital/collection/p17027coll5 Oregon Tax Court]''' (''pub'') Search decisions, opinions and orders from the United States Tax Court.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Tax court decisions only :- Federal tax court coverage
===Osceola County Circuit Court=== '''[https://courts.osceolaclerk.org/BenchmarkWeb/Home.aspx/Search Osceola County Clerk of Circuit Court]''' (''pub'') Search Osceola County Courts, Florida cases by entity or individual name.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Search by entity or individual name :- Osceola County, Florida cases
===Rhode Island Judiciary=== '''[https://publicportal.courts.ri.gov/PublicPortal/ Rhode Island Judiciary Public Portal]''' (''pub'') Rhode Island Judiciary public case search portal.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Statewide Rhode Island coverage :- Public portal access
===Scioto County Clerk of Courts=== '''[http://www.sciotocountycpcourt.org/ Scioto County Clerk of Courts]''' (''pub'') Search Scioto County legal cases by person last name or business entity name.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Search by individual or business name :- Scioto County, Ohio cases
===South Dakota Unified Judicial System=== '''[https://ujsjudgmentquery.sd.gov/Login.aspx South Dakota Civil Judgments]''' (''pub'') Public access to South Dakota State Court's Civil Judgments database.
''Guidance''
:- Login may be required :- Civil judgments only :- Statewide South Dakota coverage
===South Dakota Court Dockets=== '''[https://ujspars.sd.gov/GuestSearch.aspx South Dakota Unified Judicial System Dockets]''' (''pub'') Search docket entries for criminal, protection orders and foreign protection orders.
''Guidance''
:- Guest search available :- Criminal and protection order cases :- South Dakota unified system
===Delaware Courts Judicial Database=== '''[http://courtconnect.courts.delaware.gov/public/ck_public_qry_main.cp_main_idx State of Delaware Courts]''' (''pub'') Search court records from the state of Delaware.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Statewide Delaware coverage :- Public query system
===Superior Court of California=== '''[http://www.sccaseinfo.org/ Superior Court of California Case Information]''' (''pub'') Search court records from the Superior Court of California database.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- California Superior Court system :- Statewide case information
===Los Angeles Superior Court=== '''[https://www.lacourt.org/online/Onlineservices.aspx Superior Court of California - Los Angeles County]''' (''pub'') Request court records from Los Angeles County Superior Court.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Los Angeles County specific :- Online services portal
===Sacramento Superior Court=== '''[https://services.saccourt.ca.gov/PublicCaseAccess/ Superior Court of California, Sacramento County]''' (''pub'') Search Sacramento County Superior Court cases by name, case number, or filing date.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Sacramento County specific :- Multiple search criteria available
===Gwinnett County Courts=== '''[https://www.gwinnettcourts.com/casesearch/ Superior, State and Magistrate Courts of Gwinnett County]''' (''pub'') Search records of Superior, State and Magistrate courts of Gwinnett County, Georgia.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Multiple court types covered :- Gwinnett County, Georgia specific
===San Francisco Superior Court=== '''[https://www.sfsuperiorcourt.org/online-services Superior Court of California, San Francisco County]''' (''pub'') Search San Francisco County Superior Court civil cases by party name.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Civil cases only :- San Francisco County specific
===Union County Common Pleas=== '''[https://eservices.co.union.oh.us/eservices/home.page.2 Union County Common Pleas Court]''' (''pub'') Search Union County court cases by person or entity name.
''Guidance''
:- No login required :- Search by person or entity name :- Union County, Ohio cases
===US Bankruptcy Court Puerto Rico=== '''[https://www.prb.uscourts.gov/ United States Bankruptcy Court - District of Puerto Rico]''' (''pub'') Official website for US Bankruptcy Court for the District of Puerto Rico.
''Guidance''
:- Court-specific information :- Puerto Rico federal bankruptcy cases :- May require PACER for detailed records

The open data portal of] Uruguay publishes a list of industrial companies, which includes basic information such as contact details. Please note that this directory is partial and does not cover small and medium enterprises.

The Uruguayan corporate registry requires] a log-in to conduct a basic search that verifies whether a company name exists. For more information, the registry needs to be contacted directly.

corporate_registry.wiki_content:
* [https://www.comprasestatales.gub.uy/rupe/clientes/publicos/BusquedaPublicaDeProveedoresCliente.jsf The Uruguay State Agency for] Purchases and Contracts website allows a search through a database of contracts and tenders issued to companies by the country's regulatory body. You can search by full or partial company name. (''pub'')

* [https://www.bvm.com.uy/ Bolsa de Valores de Montevideo] is the main stock exchange of Uruguay. The website provides access to information and documents (such as financial statements) related to issuers of shares, financial trusts/trustees, stock brokers and issuers of negotiable obligations. (''pub'')

* [https://dei.miem.gub.uy/gestemp-web/paginasPublicas/registroEmpresasIndustrialesCliente.jsf The Directory of Industrial Companies] (DEI) was created to maintain the identifying information of the industrial companies in Uruguay. The database includes basic information, like contact details. This directory does not include information on small and medium companies registered in Uruguay. (''pub'')

* [https://catalogodatos.gub.uy/dataset/registro-de-empresas-industriales/resource/78920af7-0409-45f8-a04d-60ac817eeef6 The open data portal of] Uruguay publishes a list of industrial companies, which includes basic information such as contact details. Please note that this directory is partial and does not cover small and medium enterprises. (''pub'')

* [https://empresaeneldia.portaldelaempresa.gub.uy/Apia/index.htm The Uruguayan corporate registry requires] a log-in to conduct a basic search that verifies whether a company name exists. For more information, the registry needs to be contacted directly. (''reg'')

* [http://www.iadb.org/en/projects/adv Database of projects of the] Inter-American Development Bank. Supports search by keyword, project/operation number, country and includes more filter options. (''pub'')

* [https://www.camaraisrael.org.il/ Members index for the Israel-Latin] American Chamber of Commerce. Search by member name. (''pub'')
